name: 陳盈竹
objective:
This course is an introduction to basic storytelling and script planning.  By understanding the structure of narrative organization and design thinking process, students will be able to practice an interactive script design work from planning to analyzing and to finalize a visual work of story-telling script.
In class participation including brainstorming and discussion are evaluated.
schedule:
01 Introduction
02 Story brainstorming
03 Visualization of a narrative
04 Diagram practice
05 Diagram practice
06 Assignment I presentation and discussion
07 Structure of a story
08 Narrative of a story
09 Infographics
10 Interactive Script Planning I
11 Interactive Script Planning II
12 Assignment II Explain
13 Storyboard exercise I
14 Storyboard exercise II
15 Storyboard exercise III
16 Assignment II presentation 
17 Assignment II discussion
18 Final Review
